Actions.Name: Spirit Trickery
Actions.Description: The [name] gains the following interrupt until the start of its next turn.

Interrupts.Name: Spirit Trickery
Interrupts.Trigger: The [name] or an ally in range 2 is damaged by a foe's ability, and the ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effects: The triggering foe, the [name], and their ally (if applicable) are all teleported 2.
